page.description: Adds CSS to the UX Component at run-time.

argument.name: id
argument.description: An optional id (allowing you to update previously set CSS definitions.) If you do not pass in an id a new DOM 'style' node is created.

return.name: id
return.description: Returns the id of the node that was created. You can use this id to update the CSS.

discussion.p: The *[js:{dialog.object}.setCSS()]* method allows you to dynamically add CSS classes at run-time. The method returns the id of the node that was created for the CSS. This id can be used to update the CSS added to the component.
